name: Lola's World of Wonders
description:
Hey there!

Welcome to my world! Together, we are going to find many special items called "wonders," and we will be able to unlock the most important wonder of them all, "The Key to Happiness." Will you, humble friend, help me find it? Let's find out.

The Developer

Lola's World of Wonders was developed by Raffy's Playground. We sincerely hope you enjoy this game. Any feedback would be appreciated.

WARNING:

This game contains highly disturbing content, with references and graphic depictions of mental illness. People with mental issues may not have a safe experience playing this game. By downloading the game, you are agreeing that you are at least 17 years old, and you consent to be exposed to highly disturbing content.

If you or a friend is feeling depressed or suffering from an illness, please seek help immediately from a professional.

National Suicide Prevention Lifeline

Suicide is never the answer.

All our love to whoever you are.
